public class AuthorService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAuthorService
    Author service handles all the author requests. Implements IAuthorService interface

      • deleteAuthor

        public void deleteAuthor​(java.lang.Long id)
        Deletes author of provided Id. Delete here is soft delete. JMS template calls to postDelete which appends on author name to preserve the uniqueness.
        Specified by:
        deleteAuthor in interface IAuthorService
        Parameters:
        id - Author Id

      • postDelete

        @JmsListener(destination="post-author-delete",
             containerFactory="postDeleteFactory")
public void postDelete​(Author author)
        Appends author name with deleted timestamp to preserve uniqueness.
        Parameters:
        author - : Deleted Author
